name: Drippy Drop.
description: The ocean has run bare! Help Drippy soar through the sky to get back to the ocean and reclaim a thriving coral reef. Be careful, it's not as easy as it seems. Worlds to go through, enemies at every turn, and menacing bosses make this drop style platformer the first of its kind. Collect keys to unlock chests that free Drippys friends along with dozens of exotic fish that help you along the way. With simple intuitive controls and a huge range in difficulty, this is the perfect adventure for the casual player all the way to a hardcore gamer. Do you have what it takes to save the day?
